akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general Not later than May 30 of each year, the Commissioner of Social Security shall prepare and deliver a report annually to the President and the Congress regarding the program under this subchapter, including—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Views of individual members of Social Security Advisory Board

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Views of individual members of Social Security Advisory Board Each member of the Social Security Advisory Board shall be permitted to provide an individual report, or a joint report if agreed, of views of the program under this subchapter, to be included in the annual report required under this section.
